Title: Chinese I
Description: Introductory Mandarin Chinese. Includes listening, speaking, and reading, with individual audiolingual practice. Offered all terms.
Repeat Status: Not repeatable for credit

Title: Chinese II
Repeat Status: Not repeatable for credit

Title: Chinese III
Repeat Status: Not repeatable for credit

Title: Chinese IV
Description: This course includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing practice, with a focus on cultural competency and conversational skills. Builds onCHIN 103.
Repeat Status: Not repeatable for credit

Title: Chinese V
Description: This course includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing practice, with a focus on cultural competency and conversational skills. Builds onCHIN 201.
Repeat Status: Not repeatable for credit

Title: Advanced Writing and Speaking
Description: Provides advanced practice in written and oral communication, including journalistic, professional, and creative writing. Examines contemporary cultural contexts through media and news. Taught in Chinese.
Repeat Status: Not repeatable for credit

Title: Introduction to Language for the Professions
Description: Introduction to communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in Chinese.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

Title: Introduction to Power and Resistance
Description: Introduction to the analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. Taught in Chinese.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

Title: Introduction to Language, Media, and Society
Description: Introduction to the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. Taught in Chinese.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

Title: Advanced Topics in Language for the Professions
Description: Advanced communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in Chinese. Topics will vary according to the instructor's expertise.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

Title: Advanced Topics in Power and Resistance
Description: Advanced analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. Taught in Chinese. Topics will vary according to the instructor's expertise.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

Title: Advanced Topics in Language, Media, and Society
Description: Advanced analysis of the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. Taught in Chinese. Topics will vary according to the instructor's expertise.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated 8 times for 27 credits

Title: Independent Study in CHIN
Description: Self-directed within the area of study requiring intermittent consultation with a designated instructor.
Repeat Status: Can be repeated multiple times for credit
